name: Moving Out (itch) (marcossuzuki)
description:
Moving Out is a visual novel game that tells the story of a wheelchair user in the process of moving. They previously lived with their parents, and when entered college they moved to an apartment, starting a new life independently. When going through the main story, the player must help the character make decisions and thereby accomulate furniture and special objects to furnish their room. Moving Out explores a new perspective of what "home" means; For the team, home is where you can be vulnerable but also have superpowers.

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/moving-out
